name: Scientific Revolution
description: The Scientific Revolution (1543–1700) network traces the transformation of European knowledge-making through mathematics, experiment, instruments, and new institutional forms. This bridge network connects the Rosicrucian/Hartlib correspondence era to Enlightenment science, following key figures from court astronomy through the Royal Society to the Newtonian synthesis.
author: HistoryNet Contributors
